In the year 2306, a massive meteor is set to collide with Earth, wiping out life as we know it. TYPHON, an aeronautical mining project has been assigned to deter the meteor away from Earth, but only to find out that it’s a vessel for cybernetic activity.

Cyberhold is a turn-based first person dungeon crawler, with very basic Soulsborne elements.

name: Robo Runner
description: Your robot friend is stuck. Help him reach the portal whilst avoiding spikes and other robots out to kill you. There are 10 levels to try can you help him escape them all?

name: Doujins and Dragons
description: Here in Suzunaan, a great number of books from the Outside World are hidden in its bookshelves, along with books from more... supernatural sources. One such book is a guide to playing a rather peculiar game from the Outside World. As you play, help Reimu and Marisa get over whatever caused them to avoid each other and get the two girlfriends to beat relationship woes and poor, poor fairies.

name: I Don't Belong
description: Worlds based on animal occupation, with no humans, have been a common theme in media for as long as it has existed. Books, movies, games, cartoons—all of them imagined worlds based on animals. But are they really all that they promise? When Mark is transported to one of those worlds, he has to make due. Find a home, an occupation, clothes that don't have holes in the backside—everything. And in the process, he might just find love.

name: Zip: Set One
description: A challenging and minimalist maze race game.

name: Intro Fighters
description: Intro Fighters is a Twitch.tv overlay game that allows your viewers take part in a fighting minigame.

name: Tales of Yore
description:
Tales of Yore is a free online multiplayer RPG with oodles of items, quests and monsters to discover. It's all about finding and beating everything in the game. The game is in active development and has been since Spring 2021.

At time of writing the world contains around 20 hours of gameplay, 100+ NPCs, 100k tiles to explore and many random story lines along the way.

name: Jardin
description: Gardens say a lot about who you are. Jardin is a poetic and procedural walk on an endless lake, with segmented parts of XIX's french poems. Wander and build your own garden, with your unique path.

name: Death by Flower Arrangement
description: A 2D top-down shooter where you frolic among the flowers as a florist named Flanigan, keeping them at bay with your AK-47, and scattering their petals on the grassy floor in an arrangement of vibrant color.

name: Motel 666
description: A survival horror game. In order to succeed, players will need to search rooms for items and battle enemies throughout a haunted motel.

name: Concave Shooter
description: An indie top-down twin-stick shooter.

name: Staxter
description: This game is a spiritual successor to Kirby Star Stacker. Enjoy levels of great size, or intense restriction. Chill with an endless mode, or try to speed run it! A relaxing game about the garden, enjoy the sounds of the woods, while using your bug friends to collect the flowers. Sandwich flowers or buds between two matching bug friends to collect them! Or, sandwich special blocks, like the watering well or the lawn mower to use special effects.

name: She Who Fights Monsters: Choice Edition
description: Once upon a time, there was a sweet little girl with a big imagination. Her name was Jennifer (Jenny for short), and her world was full of adventure. A closet became a sanctuary. A basement became a secret passage to the Land of Elves. And her home became a nightmare world with no warning, rhyme or reason beyond the unpredictable winds of her father's drunken rage.

name: Blinck Island Returns
description: Explore! Build! Tax! Welcome to Blinck Island, a place where you can build anything you like and make money while you pass the time on our beautiful beaches!

name: Para//ax
description:
Greetings, Operator! You're here because you have agreed to operate a PARA//AX class robot for this mission. It's simple, you need to get in, get to the core, and destroy it. Sounds easy enough, right?

Though, there is one thing we've noticed... Every time we send a different bot in there, the layout of the ship changes. Whether this is because of some sort of nanotechnology, hologram, or magic, it shouldn't be a problem for you. We're sure you have all of the tools you need to handle unfamiliar environments.

name: The Tall Wall Falls: The Inner Gate's Last Stand
description: A fast-paced, physics-based, Attack on Titan inspired game. Swing around from the grapple hooks on your swords, and take down huge enemies, before they destroy the gate!

name: Obstacles
description: Steer your car, avoiding obstacles to gain score. "Grazing" an obstacle will increase your score multiplier. Try to beat your hi-score!

name: The Law
description:
Tomorrow a new decisive bill is going to be examined in the the Cabinet of Ministers, and many things are at stake. You control all the characters involved.
Game is short but not sweet. Proudly political.
Short game born at the Global Game Jam 2019. Play in English or Italian.

name: Illusory Dreamlight 1: Deprimerie
description: A short RPG which follows the adventures of Tyson, who's put into a weird world after having a strange encounter with a kitchen sink and a house fire. He soon learns he must travel this strange land and save this world, or fall to the power of Nightmare and erode away.

name: Playground
description:
The walls are bare. Give. Them. Colour.

As a floating spray can you've discovered a goldmine: an empty and under construction museum. Go in alone or with friends and give this bare museum a splash of colour and populate the empty canvases with your life bringing art.

name: Bat Lizard Bonanza
description: Bat Lizard Bonanza is an arcade shoot-em-up for the NES. It's inspired by games like Gradius and Parodius. The settlers have been exploiting Irata’s natural resources for many solar cycles. The Wampus took back the mountains. The Wart Worms took back the mines. But now Lizzy the Bat Lizard must embark on a quest to end the Settler scourge once and for all, dauntless in the wind with the echoes of her ancestors at her back.

name: Post-Shift
description:
After the traumatising shifts at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, the events that occurred during those shifts are now stuck in your mind. The original Freddy, Bonnie, Chica and Foxy return once more, but something is very off about them.

Will you survive five nights at Freddy's once again?

name: Bouncy Cars
description: A racing game for two players sharing one keyboard. Their cars bounce off of each other, and off of the walls. The maps are randomly generated, but players can replay their favorites.

name: Simple Complex Puzzle
description: A sliding-puzzle numbers game.

name: Butterflowers
description: A digital playground where you can drag and drop images from your computer to plant flowers, grow vines, start fires and upload color into an expansive network of butterflowers! Uncover the memories of a past inhabitant as you explore the evolving space of the ecosystem and breathe new life from your files and interactions with the terrain.

name: What Goes Pumpkin the Night
description: Ren is bored in a cafe waiting for zir girlfriend on Halloween. Nothing could go wrong.

name: Eyad and Hala
description: A short visual novel about life in Hamburg. Eyad and Hala are two Palestinians living in Wilhelmsburg. They find unexpected support from an Irish-run café.

name: The Pig: Money Is Time
description: Escape the hotel haunted by a malicious force. Time is Money. Money is Time. Will you be able to lift the curse, or will you be brought down by a ham-fisted metaphor?

name: Space Shooter
description: An asteroid-shooting game made by beer119.

name: Ball vs Block
description: A simple block breaker game in the vein of Breakout or Arkanoid.

name: Lillyann
description: One day, I was hit by a carriage and... I died. But why did I wake up in another world and take over the life of this girl named Ann? She was a terrible person, who bullied her classmate. "I think he hates me and I can't blame him, but I'm not going to regret it because I didn't do the bad things. After a while, he will realize that I am no longer a threat to him and will ignore me." Or that's what I thought at the time. But I was completely wrong.

A game to test how well you recognize prime numbers.

Swipe left and right to answer if a given number is prime, and see how high a chain of correct answers you can reach.

With 3 different difficulty levels, you can tune the challenge to your preferences.

name: Boys Work
description: Yume Nikki-fan game. Please handle this boy with care. Four dream worlds with over ten effects to collect.

name: Maudelyn's Quest
description: Maudelyn has been tasked with obtaining 3 key ingredients for the Princess' upcoming coronoation feast. Help Maudelyn make decisions by matching 3 or more gems on the lower half of the screen and, hopefully, obtaining all ingredients.

name: Caduceus
description:
Two-player competitive snake. Eat the food to make the snake big before times run out.
Do not let the snake hit the wall or itself or each other. Try to have the biggest snake!

name: Destruction Rocks
description: Game in which players control rocks that can destroy physics objects.

name: Septiny
description: Septiny is a 2D rage platformer game where the goal is to beat 3 levels in under 7.777 seconds. The twist? Whenever you beat all three levels, you end up replaying a slightly different (and harder) version of them, up to 7 times.

name: Space Battalion Alpha
description: Simple, short vertical shoot 'em up for up to four players in couch coop. This game is meant to be easy.

name: Chess and Dungeons
description: Chess with elements of Dungeons & Dragons 5e.

name: Invertio
description:
Originally inspired by Touhou Project's Seija Kijin, who has a screen-flipping attack in a shoot-em-up which I'm sure has never caused anyone to rage-quit Touhou 14. Unfortunately, screen flipping isn't all she's going to do to you here...

The base gameplay is fairly standard tile matching, but your actual objectives may change from level to level and complications will quickly begin compounding. Hopefully you can clear everything before Reimu has some kind of stress aneurysm.

name: Tetromino Chill
description:
Do you like placing blocks? How about placing blocks forever?

Based on Futilitris by Twinbeard Studios, Tetromino Chill is a game about chilling out and placing some blocks. Best when paired with some music or a movie.

name: Drillmin
description: A Game for Ludum Dare 48, "Deeper and Deeper."

name: Don't Save the Princess
description: The princess has been kidnapped and the knight of the kingdom has come out searching for her! It is your job to place magical launching platforms to thwart the knight's efforts and send him to his doom (via the open mouth of your pet monster). Featuring 24 original levels and level editor!

name: Probotector II: Return of the Evil Forces
description: Probotector II Is the European port of Super C (NES). Like in the original game, the main characters and enemies were changed to robots.

name: Probotector
description: Probotector is the European port of Contra (NES), which changes the main characters and enemies into robots. It was made based on the American version of the game, with the cutscenes changed accordingly.

name: Probotector
description: Probotector is the European port of Operation C (Game Boy). It changes the main characters and enemies into robots, like the other Probotector games.

name: Probotector 2
description: Probotector 2 is the European port of Contra: The Alien Wars (Game Boy). It changes the main characters and enemies into robots.

name: Super Probotector: Alien Rebels
description: Super Probotector: Alien Rebels is the European port of Contra III: The Alien Wars. It changes the main characters and enemies into robots, like the previous Probotector ports.

name: Probotector
description: Probotector is the European port of Contra: Hard Corps. It changes the main characters and enemies into robots.

name: Contra
description: Contra is the NES port of the homonymous 1987 arcade game. It is a run and gun action game developed and published by Konami. The NES port was originally released in North America, and it lacks the cutscenes and other details present in the Japanese version which was released a week later.

name: Contra
description: This is the Family Computer (Famicom) port of Contra. Even if the American and the Japanese port look similar and share the same art style and engine, the Japanese version has added content, with more animations in the backgrounds, new cheat codes and, most importantly, story cutscenes explaining the plot of the game.

name: Papa Louie: When Pizzas Attack!
description:
Liberate Papa Louie's customers today!

The adventure that started it all! While Papa Louie was hosting a party at Papa's Pizzeria, the Infamous Onion Ring infiltrated all the orders. Delicious pizzas were transformed into gooey Pizza Monsters that kidnapped all of Papa Louie's customers, teleporting them to far off lands. Armed with his trusty pizza paddle and loads of Pepper Bombs, Papa Louie must rescue all his loyal customers and put an end to the Infamous Onion Ring.

name: Dino Run
description: Dino Run is a 2D side-scroller made using Flutter and Flame engine. It is basically a clone of T-Rex game that you see in Google Chrome. The only difference is this one is much better visually.

name: A Crimp in Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Hungry Frog
description: A game about eating bugs and dodging stingers! An entry into the Mini Jam 79: Frogs Jam.

name: Math Labyrinth
description: A small Bitsy game the developer made to help teach their son math.

name: Hopper
description: An indie Frogger clone.

name: Bring Your Own Oxygen
description: A game about disability and attempting to achieve the usual. Explore Elery as a 10 year old kid just trying to finish their town history project, and uncover the town's secrets, or don't. Bring Your Own Oxygen is a story about a chronically ill child trying to do what every other kid in Elery does, only to find some strange truths about the world around them. Whether you report it or not, the consequences may be more than you think.

name: Keep It Alive
description:
You need to keep this heart alive and shuttle it from Vancouver to Tijuana.

Keep that furnace alive as well; slowing down in these parts is perilous.

May the Llord be with you.

name: Linearity
description: Linearity is a companion puzzle game: create lines, as many and as complex as you can. Just turn the blocks to make them connect until you have a line without any breaks.

name: Coriander and the Fall of Orion
description: A tiny 3D adventure game where you talk to others and cut down trees.

name: Tile Crusher
description: A puzzle game where the objective is to eliminate all destructible tiles with the wrecking ball. The catch is that you have a limited number of turns to clear the tiles, and if you run over a previously destroyed tile, it will be restored! Plan your movements before committing to them!

name: Cat Tower
description:
In Cat Tower, your grandmother has gone on a trip around the globe and has trusted you with taking care of her kittens. But you know what they say: "One is never enough!"

Play with them, feed them and love them!

name: Revenants
description:
Become a professional occult investigator, relying on your cutting edge technology from 2030 to locate, trap and battle demonic forces, all whilst solving the mystery of the occult crimes.

You'll need a sharp eye to locate evidence throughout each case, documenting all you can find with your camera whilst you explore the abandoned crime scenes. As a professional investigator, you'll also need to put the case together, connecting the dots and discovering who the culprits were.

Choose which technology you want to take on each case. Do you want to hunt down the revenant and trap it? Or set up surveillance and sensors so you can stay away from it. Either way, you'll always have your trusty tablet at your side, allowing you to picture any evidence you find and keep demonic forces at bay.

This is no regular camera, the Pentacam was built using ancient ritual magics. The demons should be afraid of you as you charge up the Pentacam and manifest them further with each shot. Until they are eventually captured within the device.

Revenants will be released in an episodic / case structure. With the base game containing the first case, and the next cases being released as they are developed as DLC.

name: OlliOlli World: Rad Edition
description:
OlliOlli World Rad Edition includes:
• OlliOlli World
• First story expansion "Void Riders" containing an entirely new biome, levels, characters, gameplay and customization unlocks. Coming Summer 2022.
• Second story expansion containing an entirely new biome, levels, characters, gameplay and customization unlocks. Coming by Fall 2022.
• "Close Encounter Skate Deck”

name: Contra
description: Contra is a run-and-gun shooter video game developed and published by Konami. It is one of the many ports of the homonymous arcade game. The MSX2 version was later re-released for the Wii and Wii U Virtual Console.

name: Elden Ring: Deluxe Edition
Grid Legends: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- Grid Legends
- Seneca & Ravenwest Pack
- 4 huge post-launch packs
- Mechanic Pass
- Volkswagen Golf GTI
- Audi R8 1:1
- Exclusive Challenges

name: Kiss Kara Hajimaru Gyaru no Koi: Kurumi no Uwasa to Honto no Kimochi
description: Second-year student Utazawa Hiroki has the disposition to want to help people in trouble and his interest is directed at the girl sitting next to him in class: Hiiragi Kurumi.

name: Kiss Kara Hajimaru Gyaru no Koi: Kurumi no Uwasa to Honto no Kimochi - Premium Edition
description:
Second-year student Utazawa Hiroki has the disposition to want to help people in trouble and his interest is directed at the girl sitting next to him in class: Hiiragi Kurumi.

This edition includes the following PS4 Game:
- Kiss Kara Hajimaru Gyaru no Koi: Kurumi no Uwasa to Honto no Kimochi
- Tapestry
- Original Soundtrack

name: Chigau!!!+
description: Mirai Minato, a boy student who attends Mokuyo High School, is woken up by a noisy childhood friend who takes care of him as usual.

name: Chigau!!!+: Premium Edition
description:
Mirai Minato, a boy student who attends Mokuyo High School, is woken up by a noisy childhood friend who takes care of him as usual.

This edition includes the following PS4 Game:
- Chigau!!!+
- B2 Tapestry
- Original Soundtrack
- Original Acrylic Key Chain

name: Nurse Enjoy Gyaru Pack
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Kiss Kara Hajimaru Gyaru no Koi: Kurumi no Uwasa to Honto no Kimochi
- Boku to Nurse no Kenshuu Nisshi
- Boku to Joi no Shinsatsu Nisshi

name: Grand Mountain Adventure: Wonderlands
description: Grand Mountain Adventure: Wonderlands is a beautiful open-world skiing & snowboarding game where you get to explore entire mountains filled with hundreds of challenges to discover and compete in. So strap on your skis or board and prepare for a great adventure in the snowy mountains!

name: 8 Bit Son-of-a-Bitch
description: Video game created by and featuring the punk band Wolf-Face. Help Michael J. Wolf make it to the basketball game on time, while also capturing the heart of his true love Boof. Avoid and destroy the maniacal Owen and Lars to save the town.

name: DJ Beats: Waifus
description: DJ Beats: Waifus is a rythme game with stunning synthwave songs and dozens of items to unlock! Collect BEATS and spend them to unlock them for your profile!

name: LUL inc.
description: LUL Inc. is a collection of over 30 different micro-games that will test your skills in a variety of genres. Can you beat them all and defeat the evil machine?

name: SSX 3
description: A downgraded 3D port for the GBA, SSX 3 features compressed graphics, simplified tracks and only two mountains compared to the three prominently featured in the home console version.

name: SSX Tricky
description: A downgraded port of the home console version, SSX Tricky is a snowboarding title released for the GBA. Compared to the original, the tracks and graphical assets have been significantly simplified to support the portable hardware.

name: MetaOps
description:
Join the battlefield and team up with your friends to put your tactical skills to the test within MetaOps, a first-person shooter built on Unity. Game Modes: Multiplayer, Campaign (soon) and Battle Royale (soon)

MetaOps harnesses the power of blockchain gaming, providing players with ownership of their earned assets to keep, trade or sell.

name: Snake
description:
Become a snake charmer by helping S N A K E with his apples.

The classic arcade game Snake arrives in a new way programmed without using any video game engine.

name: Wizard's Adventure
description: As a wizard, you are pretty powerful and also have a pretty powerful apatite! This game takes you on an adventure from a dark dungeon, to a lush forest, to a brisk and beautiful mountain top!

name: Don't Look Down
description: Can you complete the Rite of Passage platforming trial and overcome Moki's fear of heights? Don’t Look Down is a first person platforming game with an emphasis on player movement and speedrunning potential. You play as a fantasy rabbit-humanoid character named Moki. Moki must complete a Rite of Passage trial to obtain their full wings as they progress to become an adult-like mature member of their world’s society. This trial is a challenging platforming course which requires Moki to use their base skills along with the skills they obtain along the way to prove they are worthy of wielding a full set of wings.

name: Knights of the Round Torus
description: Meteor launching team building arcade action! Clear the roads and defend the citizens of a magical torus for as long as you can.

name: Golf Solitaire Simple
description: A simple Golf Solitaire game with several common rule variations and a challenge mode! Can you beat all of the levels?

name: Embers Adrift
description: Join an MMORPG focused on group gameplay, challenge, and immersion - ignite your adventure in Embers Adrift.

name: LightUp!
description: This game is made for TriJam#123. The goal is to stay out of the light in every level.

name: Voxella
description: Welcome to the world of Voxella! Here we see a young Muigi plopped into the world, with nothing to do but discover. Complete quests for other people, find treasures, explore dark caves and mysterious factories, unlock the secrets of the world and have a friendly conversation with a giant spider! Because, in the world of Voxella, everything is a conversation topic if you try hard enough.

name: Turbo Pizza
description: Casual game, where the player controls the waitress and takes orders from customers and fullfils them. Game has a lot of challenging levels and you can customize/upgrage your pizza place.

name: Celestial Links
description: The orange star must hit the red target to advance to the next level. To achieve this, release the blue and orange stars by selecting them.

name: Decommissioner
description: You are the Decommissioner - tasked with defeating the rogue AI MurderBot by gathering the tools/weapons you need while the MurderBot and it's minions are out to destroy you. Weapons and Equipment are OSP (On Site Procurement), but this is no sneaking mission. If you fail, try again, and the more enemies you defeat, the more equipment will be unlocked to find in the field.

name: Pixels Out of Space
description: You are part of a scientific group that is in charge of studying a farm where strange events have happened since months ago. Day by day, the atmosphere becomes more and more strange, and you start losing the sense of time. Suddenly, you woke up in an empty room... But you feel that something that is not from this world is watching you.

name: Jezebel and the Flame
description: When her potion for a witch goes dangerously wrong, local medicine woman Jezebel has to keep her husband Terrence alive as he's been transformed into a flame. Since they don't have much money nor wood, Jezebel has to go ask her neighbors for it. Secrets are revealed and sins are committed. How far are you willing to go to keep your love alive?

name: VR Kayaking Game
description: Welcome to a virtual kayaking experience! Originally showcased at the 2021 Auckland Indie Games Showcase (and slightly reworked since then), this is a seated Virtual Reality sandbox experience where you can travel in your kayak by paddling around!

name: Kiwi
description: Kiwi is a three level auto-scroller that focuses on the endless adventure during which the player must help maneuver the bird in order to dodge environmental obstacles whilst trying to not get killed by enemies! The powerup store gives the player an opportunity to utilize the coins collected throughout the game as well as a greater chance to get higher scores on the leaderboard. Players can also get information regarding the featured endangered species they will encounter throughout the game!

name: Hollow
description:
Hollow is a 2D roguelike where your imaginary friend helps you traverse your dreams and conquer your fears and guilt.

You are Kid. During the day, things seem dull. You talk to your parents and wander around your home and it all seems so mundane. During the night, everything is in technicolor. You explore a sprawling, procedurally generated dreamscape full of color, adventure, and excitement. Your imaginary friend, Ghost, is both your guide and your primary weapon in your dreams. Through your dreams, you and Ghost must battle your inner fears or risk being consumed by them.

name: Lost
description: Imagine a catastrophic event that forces you, your family, and your friends to flee your home and everything you knew. Imagine seeking help from a neighboring country that ruthlessly stop your attempt to enter their territory. Lost seeks to explore the topics of empathy, emotions after a tragic loss, and what it means to be a refugee.

name: Perfect Balance
description: A minimalist physics simulation game about balancing weights of different shapes and sizes on a tilting platform. Simple controls let you drag and drop weights wherever you choose, and upgrades will make the balancing easier.

name: Sunflower Maintenance
description: This game was made for the Touhou Station Game Jam. A game where you try to grow sunflowers while fairies steal them and shoot at you.

name: Martian Space Blaster
description: Martian Space Blaster is an Asteroids-like top-down shooter where you fight squid monsters in space that was made during the Miziziziz Game Jam.

name: The Three Musketeers
description: An adventure game based on the classic novel by Alexander Dumas. Play as D'Artagnan, Prothos, Athos or Aramis. In this grave mission to save a whole country, you have to fight a devious enemy.

name: I'm Not Jelly
description:
Use the best Nojellian warriors in a war between jelly-like creatures and their plant-like enemies, in battles full of vibrantly colorful violence!
A skill-based rogue-lite, explore different planets composed of rooms with objectives to complete.

name: The Quiet Lonely House
description: The Quiet Lonely House is a prototype Survival Horror experience where out main character, Danny Warson, is investigating an old house in the outskirts of Dellaware. He is currently looking for his old friend Clive however what is in store for him at this old house is what he prepared for, as Danny Warson is no stranger to strange occurrences.

name: Snowman Adventure
description: Snowman Adventure is a third-person platformer. In this cool game you play as John the snowman. You have to get through all the obstacles to complete this game. This game will give you unforgettable emotions of joy and fun. Play it with cheerful and perky music!

name: Hellhole
description: Hellhole is an isometric physics puzzle game for Windows. Consume everything. Defy Gaia. We will be our own undoing.

name: VaporLight: Drifter
description: Welcome to the VaporLight Void, a place many Racers find themselves in sooner or later. You don't know how you ended up here and you don't know what to do with yourself. That's fine. You won't find guidance here, but maybe you can find it in yourself.

name: Money Garden
description: You have a tree in your garden—a MONEYTREE! Strap your lawn vacuum on you back and collect all the money as it drops. Try to keep your garden clean.

name: Easter Bunny on Speed
description: An endless 2D platformer about a bunny.

name: Multilytheus
description: An abstract puzzle game about navigating space.

name: PachaMama
description: A side-scroller game containing some mini games based on mindfulness techniques to relieve stress.

name: Slimed
description: Slimed is an action-platformer where you play as an extraterrestrial slime captured by military agents testing your capabilities. Show them just how weak their Earth weapons are!

name: Lutra's Monologue
description: A short furry visual novel monologue about friendship.

name: Crnvrs
description: You control a dog. Everything else is open to interpretation.

name: MineFinitum
description: Play Minesweeper on an infinitely scrolling board. No penalties. No time limit. No salvation. Just more tiles to solve.

name: Orc Hunt
description: An 2d adventure game

name: Courage the Cowardly Dog: Creep TV
description: Courage In Creep TV is an adventure game starring Courage The Cowardly Dog. Eustace and Muriel were captured by poltergeists and put inside the TV and it's Courage's job to rescue them again. The game uses a top-down perspective and Courage can pick up objects, combine and use them. After picking up the remote control of the TV and putting batteries into it, Courage can shoot the poltergeists in his house and keep them away from him.

name: Your Majesty
description: Your Majesty is an innovative project that combines RPG with music. In this game the fantasy world which players are in is on the verge of complete destruction. Players will become the helper of the King of Queen who are suddenly transported to this world and will embark on an adventure-themed around "Justice" and "Madness".

name: Christmas Massacre
description: Larry's Christmas tree has been telling him to kill. But whose side is the tree really on? And can he trust what he's hearing? CHRISTMAS MASSACRE is an 80's inspired stealth slasher game with low-poly, PS1-style graphics. Sneak, stalk and murder your prey without being caught. You must kill without being seen to complete each level.

name: Hashiriya Drifter
description: Drift Online Multiplayer Game - The game inspired by old-school street drifting in early japan with deep customization and ability to build a car from scratch! Dismountable chassis and suspension! Realistic car damage! Get together with friends, tune your car and burn some tires!

name: Shikkoku no Sharnoth: What a beautiful tomorrow
description: The player assumes the role of Mary Clarissa Christie. Mary has heterochromia eyes, her right eye is gold while her left eye is blue. She originally had blue eyes but her right eye changed colours one year prior to the game's events and she has been seeing strange visions since.

name: Vortle
description: Vortle is anxiety management and stress relief app designed by and for neurodiverse, disabled, or mentally ill people.No need to register. No need to log in. Download now to instantly experience soothing games, safe spaces, and relaxing activities.

name: Drone Showcase
description: 'Drone Showcase' is an Action-Packed, Fast-Paced, Time-Trial Racing game used to feature the dynamic capabilities of our Physics-based drones! Smash through Rubble blocking your path, slip through Giant Ventilation fans, avoid Flammable Gas Pipes, Dodge projectiles & make it to the End!

name: Superposition
description: Superposition is a simple sokoban style puzzle game about duplication. By splitting yourself into multiple copies you have to maneuver onto all goal tiles simultaneously to progress.

name: Fire & Steel
description: Fire & Steel is the first chapter of a fast-paced, old-school, arcade aerial shooter where you burn down the mighty armies of World War II as Ancient Dragon Aiden!

name: LawnMower City
description: You control a lawnmower and need to cut all the grass and plants in the city. You have to be beware not to crash into traffic or get shot.

name: Esten
description: A highly experimental bullet hell that plays unlike anything else. No auto scrolling, No credits, No holding back. Let Heaven's Chaos Reign!

name: Christmas Wonderland 12
description: Christmas Wonderland 12 is an indie adventure game. Enjoy magnificent Christmas festivities in Springfield. Help Santa at the North Pole. Visit Robot Toy Workshops, an Ice Palace, Petting Zoo & Grotto. See Dancer's new baby Reindeer.

name: Lumencraft
description: Desperate, outnumbered and with gun turrets as your only companion. Lumencraft is a top-down shooter with base-building elements. Drill through fully destructible environment to reach precious resources, and spend them on weapons and tools protecting the last bastion of humanity.

name: Retro First Friday Collection #3
description: Sin descripción

name: Retro First Friday Collection #4
description: Sin descripción

name: Rhythm Sprout
description:
Rhythm Sprout is a handcrafted fast-paced rhythm action with original music and a wacky story mode.

Enjoy chill Lo-fi walks and fight bosses to K-POP, EDM and Hip-Hop inspired tracks. Features a quirky story, 30 handcrafted levels, and various EX-modes to refresh your gameplay.

name: Slash & Roll
description: Join an online RPG multiplayer game and roll dice to face off against other guilds! Play with friends online in epic co-op battles. Fight in multiplayer PvP team battles against other guilds to dominate the ranking! It’s just the beginning of what Slash & Roll, one of the most interesting online multiplayer games with friends, has to offer!

name: Juqueision
description: Juqueision new multiplayer game, Bing bang, start season, have fun with your friends in games of nine players per room, select the machine and enjoy this early version, share it and help us grow and develop new gaming experiences;).invite your friends to play with you.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs Ankha
description: Vs. Ankha is a mod by Akirawave, the mod is based on a popular character from Zone Ankha and from Animal Crossing franchise. The mod has 3 Songs.

name: Squad Battles: The Proud and the Few
description:
Squad-level wargame set in WW2 Pacific Theater that focuses on the battles of the United States Marines against the forces of Japan. Relive those glorious moments of the Marine history in their victorious advance from one island to another. From Guadalcanal to Okinawa, and even to the shores of the Japanese home islands, join the fight to ultimate victory.
The Proud and the Few includes 46 Scenarios, including Wake Island, Tarawa, Guadalcanal, Iwo Jima, and others, covering all sizes and situations.

Included are 23 unique maps ranging in size from 390 hexes to 77,028 hexes, covering many of the island hopping operations in the Pacific theater.

The Order of Battles include US Army, US Marine, Japanese Army and Japanese Naval soldiers.

Unit component, Order-of-Battle and Scenario Editors which allow players to customize the game.

Map & Sub-map editors allowing map creation and any of the included maps to be "chopped" up into smaller segments for custom scenario creation.

The Proud and the Few provides multiple play options including play against the computer AI, Play by E-mail (PBEM), LAN & Internet "live" play, and two player hot seat.

name: Inscryption: Kaycee's Mod
description: Kaycee's Mod is a free mini-expansion for Inscryption that hacks Leshy’s Cabin into an endless, and increasingly challenging, roguelike. Apply different skulls to your run to ascend the Challenge Levels. Reaching new levels unlocks new cards, challenges, and dev logs inscribed by the late Kaycee Hobbes as she uncovered the secrets on the disk.

name: King's Choice
description: King's Choice is an exciting RPG game simulating life at the European medieval royal court. Become a legendary king and recruit famous generals, meet stunning beauties, raise your heirs, suppress rebellions, and expand your empire with the ultimate goal of becoming the supreme emperor!

name: Horizon Call of the Mountain
description: Horizon Call of the Mountain, created for PlayStation’s Next-Gen VR hardware, is an upcoming brand-new adventure in the world of Horizon. Embrace a new level of immersion in a unique experience, designed to push hardware technology, innovation, and gameplay.

name: Pink Elephant
description: Pink Elephant is a 2D shooter with a top view whose task is to clear all the rooms from enemies and move to a new room, which in turn will bring you closer to the final of the game.

name: Lily's Well
description: It is a rainy night in the Spring of 2005. Lily is left home alone after her Papa put her to bed. She is awoken by a cry for help outside her window. It is coming from the well. Help Lily gather rope to go down the well and save the poor soul trapped down there.

name: Big Booty Adventures
description: Glory awaits! Hoard your treasures and battle enemies as you move through a physically challenging world. Learn to wield a variety of weapons and strategize your assault to obtain loads of booty. Explore the world to find hidden treasures to customize your playstyle and enhance your abilities.

name: Yokaiware
description: Face the scariest Yokai in this cursed collection of 28 fast-paced Microgames, each with a different mechanic, look, and feel!

name: Theory of Poltaran
description: Theory of Poltaran is an action - adventure game where players can explore the surroundings of locations, participate in battles with creatures from laboratories, as well as fully immerse themselves in a fantastic plot.

name: Skeletal Skism
description: War has broken out between the undead... All for one sole purpose: to determine the One - True - Skeleton - King. Do you have what it takes to claim the crown?

name: Mixx Island: Remix Vol. 2
description: Mixx Island: Remix Vol. 2 is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty! This beautiful place was built only for simple fun! Choose the character and difficulty level that best suits you and enjoy a short, simple but colorful boss rush minigame!

name: Endless Battlefield
description: Endless Battlefield is a competitive multiplayer online FPS game. It gives players the capacity to control various weapons and vehicles in the game.The FPS covers 6 modes: Conquest, Capture the Flag, Rush, Team Deathmatch, Deathmatch and Kill Confirmed.

name: Superstar Streetz
description: Superstar Streetz is a multiplayer action-packed racing game. Race to success in 2 minute races, and outcompete your opponents with a range of destructive and fancy weapons across different race tracks.

name: Pixel Robot Return
description: Pixel robot is coming back. Destroy enormous robot boss and collect treasures

name: Ruins of Mitriom
description: Explore the continent in search of Mitriom, ancient energy crystals to power the various improvements of your caravan (Skills, Bonus, Cannon on the caravan etc). Dynamically manage your resources to adapt your skills according to the situation.

name: Maze of Bears
description: World-wrapping, block-sliding, bear-avoiding, non-euclidean, cat-collecting puzzle, with crazy number of power-ups and block interactions.

name: Legendary Tales: Cataclysm
description: A dreadful prediction came to the oracle — the cataclysm is coming. The renegade witch is about to save the world or ruin it… “Legendary Tales: Cataclysm” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests.

name: F-Rank Hero Story
description: This beautiful fantasy world will never be friendly to you. Games mimic many aspects of real life. You are a insignificant F mercenary in a world where magic and monsters exist.

name: Alice!
description: Alice chased the rabbit. Then, she fell. she fell from top to bottom. Slam! The noise echoed. Shoot, my butt. It must be the destiny of 「Alices」 to suffer. But still, shouldn’t she watch out for herself to avoid going through such incidence in the 21st century?

name: Pilapa Boom
description: Pilapa Boom is an extremely lightweight mini game. Players can shoot bullets to detonate the bombs and trigger a chain of explosions to open the path to the end. There is almost no learning cost, and you can play it right away.

name: Cursed House
description: In the process of searching for real estate, he comes across a lucrative offer - a 2-storey house with a basement and an attic for only $295,000. After much hesitation, he contacts the seller and agrees to the deal. But what happened on the next day after the move, he was shocked.

name: LinearShooter Remixed
description: "LinearShooter Remixed" is a game that combines vertical scrolling bullet hell shmup with rogue-lite that combine power-ups to build builds. Let's aim to clear the stage by assembling your ship with power-up while getting drunk with minimal and beautiful graphics and trance music.

name: Mission Critical: Foresight
description: When scientists resumed their Unified Field Theory experiments this time the succeeded- with devastating consequences. You are trapped on a desolate Lunar Base with only your wits, real world astronaut weapons and a heads up display to give you instructions.

name: PC Creator: PC Building Simulator
description: Try yourself as a PC builder and build your dream PC from 200+ real components!Complete different PC building and PC repair orders to upgrade your business: build a PC from zero, install popular OS', upgrade computers, install different programs and games, fix PC parts, and much more.

name: Criminal Archives: City on Fire - Collector's Edition
description: San Francisco is shaken by a chain of horrible murders. You are the only one that can bring to justice a masked arsonist calling himself the Plague Doctor. Are you strong enough to face the challenge?

name: Royal Legends: Marshes Curse - Collector's Edition
description: The people of Libertyville are in danger! Evil and witchcraft are gaining strength to carry out an insidious plan to take over the city. Help the authorities stop the Swamp Witch and save innocent people!

name: Red Embrace: Paradisus
description: Red Embrace: Paradisus is an immersive vampire sim/narrative RPG. RE:P seeks to create a dark, fully story-driven vampire experience with branching narrative and multiple endings.

name: Ms. Holmes: The Adventure of the McKirk Ritual - Collector's Edition
description: Old secrets rarely stay buried...

name: Space Demon Combat Tactics III
description: Join the High Commander as the eternally loyal Green in an epic journey to save the Blues from the menace of the Greys and their evil Red Gems!

name: Tkium Exclusion Area
description: Tkium Exclusion Area is an horror escape game. You need to get out of this place, and quickly. Even if this area looks abandoned, nothing can confirm that you are really alone. You have to leave quickly, the fear is taking over you.

name: Tether
description: Tether is an abstract arcade platformer about elastic connections and arcing flights. Swing and fly through 4 different game modes, in a peaceful, endless world.

name: Tales of the Underworld: Legends of Primordial Sea
description: Uncompromising survival & Fantasy World Exploration: You play as Rain and Jonah, who enter the Underworld full of revenants, entities and surprises. combat with ninjas that match your survival style. Fight your way out as you unravel the secret of Jonah's plan.

name: Clockwise Jinx
description: A puzzle with unusual motion mechanics.

name: Crates n' Mohawks
description: Oi! Gun down and roll through waves of enemies in this arcade twin-stick shooter where surviving and collecting the highest number of gun crates is the only rule!

name: Battlefleet Gothic: Armada 2 - Deluxe Edition
description: Battlefleet Gothic: Armada 2 - Deluxe Edition, includes the base game and the Official Soundtrack.

name: Battlefleet Gothic: Armada - Deluxe Edition
description: Battle for the control of the Gothic sector in Battlefleet Gothic: Armada Deluxe Edition, including the base game and the Original Soundtrack.

name: Galactic Gladiators
description: Warriors from all over the galaxy came to these gladiatorial fights, including ... mushroom? a stone? it seems that the great wars are too busy for our battles of epic proportions.

name: Lenny!
description: Lenny is a kid-friendly, first person collection of mini-games inspired by Baldi's Basics, Rockstar's Bully, Chex Quest, late 90s/early 2000s Cartoon Network/Nickelodeon, and the sound design of the NES/Atari 2600/SNES chipsets.

name: Shooterwave
description: Do you like the VAPORWAVE style? If yes, like me, then I believe that you should play this game, which contains nice music, nice graphics and a shooter. Enjoy it!

name: Motherload: Goldium Edition
description: Navigate the dangers of Martian soil, complete with hidden gas pockets, earthquakes, and other surprises. Purchase powerful upgrades for your Mining Pod with the fruits of your labor.

name: Doodle God: Fantasy World of Magic
description: Sin descripción

name: The Fall of Rallys Factory: Episode 2 - It's for Science
description: Help William to get out of Factory , but just watch out for the monsters that live in the shadows

name: Landshay: Event Night
description:
Immerse yourself in the epic action world and pass the test in the adventure game.

Avoid dangers, run away from wild animals, overcome obstacles to advance further inside the mysterious world. Find secret locations in each level.

name: Bit Adventure
description: Bit adventure-created by indie Studio Lord Game LLC, and is a casual arcade game. The game boasts Multiplatforms, it works both in the browser and on all operating systems.

name: Lightfield: Kartridge Edition
description: Explore beyond the boundaries of a traditional racing experience and sink into the striking visuals and hypnotic electro soundtrack.

name: Red Ball Evolved
description: Collect the coins and save the town. Solve challenges, defeat enemies and destroy evil boss.

name: G-Switch 3+
description:
G-Switch 3+ is the definitive version of the popular gravity runner, for PC.

Play solo, or with up to 8 players on one keyboard!

Includes all 21 multiplayer maps in the series, fullscreen HD graphics and improved performance.

name: Boxes
description: After the death of her mother, a woman returns home to confront the painful memories of her past.

name: Patrol Against Space Sabotage
description: Fight against the wretched aliens in the everyday battles of PASS as they use everything in their arsenal to endlessly fend off the evil species from Planet Disguzk i.e. a purple metallic dog, a green bulb & a rotten red donut!

name: A Classical Kickabout
description: The beautiful game just got even more artful. A Classical Kickabout is a local multiplayer football based tug of war taking place within a gallery hosting art from around the world.

name: Net_Defender
description:
Prepare to enter the Net. The name for the internet in the year 2119 after it has become overcome by malicious software and hackers.

Use your ship to fight off malware and take back the net

name: Koikatsu Sunshine
description: "Koikatsu Sunshine" revolves in the player (a male) going into vacation in a paradisiac southern Japanese island with his colleagues from an all-girl’s school with the objective to develop relationships with the girls.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Ultimate Bundle
description: Find an unparalleled grand strategy experience in the Europa Universalis IV: Ultimate Bundle, with years of content included in one package.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Empire Bundle
description: The Empire Bundle is the ultimate package for aspiring conquerors. Including every major expansion for the game, up to and including 2020's Emperor, the Empire bundle gives you everything you need to rewrite early modern history.

name: while True: learn() - Deep Edition
description: Base Game + Soundtrack + Art Pack

name: House Flipper Bundle
description: Base Game + Garden DLC + HGTV DLC + Luxury DLC

name: RiMS Racing: Japanese Manufacturers Deluxe Edition
description: The Japanese Manufacturers Deluxe Edition provides the best experience for Honda, Kawasaki, Yamaha and Suzuki motorcycles. It also includes the Bloody Beetroots Specials DLC and the Career Pro Starter Pack.

name: RiMS Racing: European Manufacturers Deluxe Edition
description: The European Manufacturers Deluxe Edition provides the best experience for Aprilia, BMW, Ducati and MV Agusta motorcycles. It also includes the Bloody Beetroots Specials DLC and the Career Pro Starter Pack.

name: Wolfstride: Golden God Edition
description: The ultimate prize for aspiring Golden God champions: this bundle includes the Wolfstride base game, exclusive wallpapers showcasing the game's stunning art, the OST featuring over fifty unique tracks, and a script giving fans unique insights into the game.

name: Forspoken: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Forspoken follows the journey of Frey, a young New Yorker transported to the beautiful and cruel land of Athia. In search of a way home, Frey must use her newfound magical abilities to traverse sprawling landscapes and battle monstrous creatures.

name: A Total War Saga: Troy - Ultimate Edition
description: Become a legend on the battlefields of the Trojan War and save 40% with the Ultimate Edition! This action-packed bundle includes the base game, MYTHOS Expansion Pack, new Rhesus & Memnon DLC and more. Strike fast – you only have until 5th January 2022!

name: while True: learn() - Data Scientist Edition
description:
while True: learn() is a puzzle/simulation game about even more puzzling stuff: machine learning, neural networks, big data and AI. But most importantly, it's about understanding your cat.

This Data Scientist Edition includes;
- The base game: while True: learn()
- A soundtrack

name: while True: learn() - Chief Technology Officer Edition
description: Base Game + Soundtrack + Art Pack + Mega Map

name: Aeterna Noctis: Deluxe Edition
description: The Aeterna Noctis Deluxe Edition includes the complete game plus the 3 official DLCs to date: Artist Map, Game Soundtrack, and Exclusive Wallpapers. The best way to experience Aeterna Noctis is by purchasing this epic bundle!

name: House Flipper: Luxury DLC
description:
No more small houses with dozens of little rooms - size is what really counts!
Glass roofs, plate glass windows for walls and a ceiling many feet above your head - this is how kings live!
Take run-down tenement houses and old industrial buildings - factories, large commercial buildings and warehouses - and turn them into luxury apartments.

name: Vanaris Tactics
description: Vanaris Tactics is a short narrative tactical RPG experience that tells a story about refugees fleeing their occupied motherland. You lead a group of refugees looking for freedom outside the walls of Vanaris, unite your people and use tactical prowess to escape your oppressors.

name: The Angry Video Game Nerd: The Angry Video Game
description:
The Angry Video Game Nerd: The Angry Video Game is a retro-styled platformer based on the Angry Video Game Nerd comedy web series. The premise is that the angry video game nerd is playing a bad NES game - starring himself! The game features original commentary by AVGN creator James Rolfe, commenting on the game action as you play.

The game consists of eight themed levels with their own bizarre enemies and hazards, each one ending with a boss battle. The fourth and eight stages differ from the rest by instead being scrolling shoot 'em up rather than the regular platforming gameplay.

The nerd has an infinite supply of empty beer bottles which can be thrown either forward or in an upwards arc. You can also roll by pressing down, even while jumping, which makes you a smaller target but you can't shoot while rolling. Defeated enemies will sometimes drop exclamation mark items which refills some health, or even more rarely an extra life item. Dying will send you back to the last checkpoint. You start with three lives, if you run out of lives the game is over.

name: AVGN: Game Over
description:
AVGN: Game Over, or the mockery of several classics through bad puns and foul language. It’s a platformer that has your character jumping, punching and cursing every time he scrapes his knee.

On the fence between being amusing and downright inappropriate

From a graphics standpoint, AVGN: Game Over can’t be argued with because it is a fan-made game that aims to be anything but serious, but seriously offensive. It uses a retro look with old’school gameplay that work well together and with the rest of the game concept.

In every level you’ll be punching goombas, Kirbys and a whole lot of characters from popular platformers and not only. In the standalone games, some of the future punching bags are evil characters, others are heroes but in AVGN: Game Over they are all categorically victims.

The game pushes forward a sense of useless violence that is backed up by a good deal of verbal abuse that just isn’t right. At times cursing a bit can be funny but I’m not sure that this game has that thought in mind.
Drop the F bomb, literally

The game is meant to reflect The Angry Video Game Nerd who has made a name for himself for openly bashing games that he considered to be bad. Presentation was everything and that’s also obvious in the game. There is a lot of cursing and to recharge his life essence, he drinks beer just like in real life.

As a game, AVGN: Game Over is...something. Having repetitive gameplay is an understatement because you can finish the game just by using a single move and the constant ‘F***’ shouts get annoying after a while.
If you’re the kind who easily gets frustrated, don’t play this

To wrap it up, AVGN: Game Over is not something worth recommending. As a game, it’s barely decent and its ‘charm’ solely revolves around the use of trash-talk and downright indecent language.

name: The Angry Video Game Nerd: Game Over 2
description:
This is an old game of mine that I felt like sharing here. Problems may occur while playing it, so apologies up front. Original release date was back in 2010.

Lord Gavin, a dark master with a once terrifying power to alter reality as he saw fit, sot to rewrite the physical world in his image, leaving those helpless to beg under his will. Thought time, he was cast into eternal imprisonment within the virtual world by heros chosen by fate and chance. There he would reside and spare the world from his dark intent. With the knowledge of him gone from the passing of time, Lord Gavin once agai became unbound from his virtual domain and was free to unleash his wrath into our world. With humanity staring Virtual Armageddon in the eyes, another chosen hero stood to face against this evil and drive it out of our world. That hero was known as "The Angry Video Game Nerd".

name: Tall Bagel 2: Avocado Hardtack
description: The full cast of Tall Bagel returns for a fateful encounter. Play once again as silent millennial dinner-eater Mar, except this time you have telekinesis and can also see people's bones.

name: CrazyRacing AirRider
description: Nexon's AirRider was an airplane racing game actively developed for 3 months in 2009. It closed in 2012 due to a lack of players.

name: KongKong Online
description: KongKong Online was an arcade jumping-based racing game developed by South Korean company, Mega Enterprise and released in 2005. Players controlled funny-looking jumping karts with an array of different weapons.

name: Office No. 41
description: Experience an adventure horror gameplay. Solve puzzles, find secretes and don't get catched by the creatures of this abandoned place. Be ready to hide wherever you can. The puzzles you must solve can be very different. In some moments, be very attentive and use your brain.

name: Timings
description: Jump from platform to platform in this minimalist puzzle platformer. All platforms except your starting platform move at different speeds, some even carry the coveted token.

name: Bomb Voyage
description: Battle up to 4 of your friends in this local play brawler to become the ultimate bomb testing robot. It's an explosive game of keep away!

name: Wrong train
description: What if you got on the wrong train that you were waiting for and fell asleep, and woke up to find that there are no people around anywhere else, and the train itself is endless? Will you be able to return home?

name: Down the Hill
description: Down the Hill is an arcade scoring game. Move down the hill along the cells avoiding holes and trees.

name: Slaughter Cannon
description: Slaughter Cannon is an addictive physics puzzle game with exciting and challenging levels of varying difficulty.

name: Punk Wars: Hold the Line
description: Sin descripción

name: GrooVR: Air Drumming
description: GrooVR is a unique VR rhythm game for Oculus Quest where your goal is to hit the beats (represented by small plates) as they are coming at the parts of the drum.

name: Daraku Gear
description: Sin descripción

name: Klorets
description: A bullet hell shooter where you can manipulate time to earn high scores.

name: ONO: Brain Fog
description:
Think straight with a new kind of puzzle that relies on your most basic brain functions - motion & prediction. Beneath the words of Wordle. Below the math of Sudoku.
Start a chain reaction that will clear all the O's from the screen -> ONO (no O's).
Starting with the simplest forms + rules, complexity and variety emerge as elements are added. A fun easy way to work on your clarity, focus and working memory.

name: Apartment
description:
When all this began, I left my home and most of my belongings behind.
My apartment, recreated from memory.

name: The Paper Mario Christmas Special
description: Paper Mario Christmas Special is a ROM Hack of Paper Mario. It was developed by Rain, Alex, Fish, Fewffwa, and Den of the Paper Mario Modding Discord.

name: Resident Evil 2
description: The Game.Com edition of Resident Evil 2 follows much the same structure and story of its console counterpart. This version has the player control Leon by positioning him in the direction he needs to go and by having him move forward whilst engaging zombies. Leon can only be moved over three horizontal planes as in a 2D game with a side view, but with a pseudo 3D effect. Each non-scrolling location holds different zombies and once they are dead Leon moves to a new screen. He has access to an inventory to cycle between weapons. There is support for options such as touchscreen inventory menus, in addition to the game keeping track of the time the player has spent with the game.

name: Good Day
description: Explore a Chinese rice field themed casino and face your worst fears.

name: Triple Fantasy
description:
Three Cards, Triple Fun!
Triple your damage by combining three cards. Make the best deck with the best strategy!

name: O2Jam U
description: The first mobile adaptation of the original 2003 PC game, O2Jam. The goal is to tap the notes to the rhythm as they fall from the top of the screen.

name: The Soul Stone War 2
description: Overcome all obstacles by trusting in your own strength, the power of your Soul Stone, and your loyal companions. Become the legend you were born to be.

name: American Christmas
description: American Christmas is a Mario-Megaman-Sonic inspired 2D platformer. This game aims to recapture that magic feeling you’d get when gaming during a time in the 90's when 2D platformers reigned king in the gaming industry.

name: Galactic Dreams
description: Humanity is racing through space on the wings of hope, away from the emerging threat of a cosmic cataclysm that could spell extinction. And mysterious aliens with powers beyond imagining follow them everywhere they go.

name: Letters From the Moon
description: In this sci-fi pick your own story game, you must help astronaut Dorothy Chen survive in a vast underground alien city beneath the moon's surface. She faces insane robots, mutant canines, starvation, and insanity inside the city of the Anthria. Whether she survives is up to you.

name: It's Kooky
description: It's Kooky is a beautiful hand drawn game filled with unusual/silly but likeable characters and items. Make sure you find all of the quirky doodles before the ticking clock stops!!

name: Storm: Lost Normality
description: Curve the space-time continuum to overcome obstacles and solve puzzles.

name: Shiba Army
description: Try to survive with your character on an imaginary path to the moon. Collect as many coins as possible, play to get the highest score, so that you can be your own captain in the Shiba Inu army.

name: Argonauts Agency: Glove of Midas
description: The Argonauts Agency – Experiments with a magical glove lead to a hilarious blunder!

name: Dream Fruit Farm
description: Tom and Charlize very love fruits and want to build their own dream fruit farm. Will we help them in this fun Match3 game?

name: Roman Triumph
description: At the northern fringes of the empire, a new Roman city is born! Manage and grow your city, please the gods, and survive against barbarians and mythological threats to achieve Roman Triumph!

name: Zombies Killer Machine
description: With only some run-down cars at your disposal, your mission soon becomes clear. Drive through hordes of zombies in order to escape alive!

name: Void Grimm
description: Void Grimm is a real-time deckbuilding roguelike game. Fight your way through waves of enemy spaceships. Your survival in the fast-paced battles requires quick thinking even at increased adrenaline levels. Gather your crew, optimize your deck and utilize card synergies to master your runs.

name: Kinder Pingui: Fresh Adventures
description:
Fresh Adventures is a 2001 collection of 4 advergames all themed around the Kinder product line, developed by Ubisoft GmbH and Ferrero Germany. Released in Germany, Austria and Italy (as far as we are aware), the player takes control of "Pingui" and "Milchschnitte" and must venture forth and defeat the 4 villains of the game.
The game is seperated into 4 sub-games:
Der finsteres Dschungle (English: The Dark jungle)
Das magische Tal (English: The Magical Valley)
Der geheimnisvolle Berg (English: The Mysterious Mountain)
Die Weltraumfabrik (English: The Space Factory)

name: Pila
description: Are you hungry for a challenge? Well I've spent quite a bit of time cooking one up for you. My game Pila is a minimalistic puzzler that incorporates physics and timing to put your logic to the test. Your only objective is to guide the ball to the portal, using the various items in each level. As you progress through the 50 levels, there will be new items to learn how to use. There are no instructions meaning it is up to you to learn how to play the game, but don't worry, you'll figure it out. I made most of the sounds ambient in efforts to reduce your frustration on the harder levels. I hope you enjoy and good luck!

name: First Steps
description: Take your first steps in VR and get to know your controllers in this short experience that showcases the power of Oculus.

name: A Tale of Little Berry Forest
description: A Tale of Little Berry Forest is a Korean fable game with lots of emotions and charming tales. Has handmade illustrations and calm music that makes the game feel like a fairytale. The game has various stories about individual characters and gameplay elements with farming and mini-games.

name: Zed's Alchemy
description: You have only four basic elements: Fire, Water, Earth and Air. Combine them and their products to get more than 200 new elements. You can create a Life, Beer, Vampires, Skyscrapers and much more..

name: Balance Stuff
description:
Balance Stuff is a physics-based game where stacking and placing objects based on your choice will provide the most soothing and calming feeling ever.

The art is created in a manner to represent a very relaxing mood. And there is no shortage of content here. We have more than 300 levels of Balancing fun ready to play through.

name: Curses of Tarot
description: Curses of Tarot is a single-player poker and Tarot themed deckbuilding card game with a variety of play modes, mini-games and challenges. Swap cards to create poker hands, plan your matches to clear each board, fortify your deck with glorious boons, break any curses inflicted upon you, and test your fate in a variety of special events!

name: Block Drop Duel
description:
Block Drop Duel is a classic action puzzle game. As the blocks drop from above move them left and right to make the perfect fit. Filling an entire line across will clear that line. 10 speed levels and 2 game modes make this game easy to grasp, but harder to keep up with in the higher levels.

Have a friend join you in a 2 player game. Each player is given an identical sequence of blocks to keep things fair. Clearing 2 or more lines at a time will send penalty lines to your opponent. In Classic Mode the player whose board fills to the top loses. In Speed Run Mode the first player to get to a specified number of cleared lines wins!

name: Blox 3D City Creator
description:
Blox 3D City lets you create fully functional cities and towns from busy metros to sleepy towns and rain-swept docks.

Create your own characters and populate your cities with hundreds of unique characters.

Add shops, garages, bridges and trees to fully populate your world with no limit on time or creativity.

Over 2 million different cities have been created and shared by kids worldwide since release.

name: Bug Bomber
description:
Bug Bomber is a classic arcade game for iOS. Your board is full of red, yellow and blue bugs. Destroy all the bugs using the colored bombs dropping from above. Sequences of four or more of the same color will clear that entire sequence. 21 levels of difficulty and 3 different speeds make this game easy to grasp, but harder to finish at the higher levels and speeds.

Have a friend join you in a 2 player game. Each player is given an identical board of bugs and bomb color sequence to keep things fair. Clearing 2 or more sequences in one drop will send penalty bombs to your opponent. The first to clear the bugs from their board wins!

name: Polarized! MonkeyBox 1
description:
A story driven by your camera.

What happened that winter night?
Uncover the secrets with your camera.

Enjoy your first photo mystery: A game controlled by the pictures you take.

8:11 follows a French priest named Ryker Dublin, and their best friend, Leon. Both take shelter inside an abandoned church one night, when suddenly; Leon gifts you a cursed Bible just moments before he is mysteriously murdered.

Against Leon's wishes, Ryker leaves France to track down the man that killed their friend; seeking violent revenge. The player will explore new foreign lands, meet a strange cast of characters, watch reality distort, and see how Ryker processes their psychological trauma.

name: Circle
description:
Make the circle jump and avoid hitting the line!

How far can you go?
